campgrounds.name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
campgrounds.description: Maasai Mara National Reserve is a Kenyan savannah wilderness area. It's famous for the annual wildebeest migration and is home to lions, cheetahs, elephants, and other wildlife.

campgrounds.name: Hellâ€™s Gate Gorge
campgrounds.description: Located in the Hell's Gate National Park, this campsite offers stunning views of the gorge and surrounding landscapes. Activities like hiking, rock climbing, and biking are available.

campgrounds.name: Kilima Safari camp
campgrounds.description: Situated in Amboseli National Park, Kilima offers spacious accommodation with views of the animal water pools and the Mount Kilimanjaro. Guided game drives and bush walks are offered.

campgrounds.name: Mbweha Camp Lake Nakuru
campgrounds.description: Mbweha Camp Lake Nakuru is located in the Congreve Conservancy, bordering Lake Nakuru National Park on the south eastern boundary. The property offers a swimming pool, restaurant and bar on site.

campgrounds.name: Fisherman's Camp
campgrounds.description: Set on the shores of Lake Naivasha, Fisherman's Camp offers stunning views and a variety of water activities like fishing and boat rides.

campgrounds.name: Kiboko Luxury Camp
campgrounds.description: Experience the thrill of the wild at Kiboko Luxury Camp, situated in the heart of the Maasai Mara National Reserve. The camp offers luxurious tents, guided safari tours and cultural experiences.

campgrounds.name: Eagle View Campsite
campgrounds.description: Nestled on the slopes of Ngong Hills, Eagle View Campsite offers breathtaking views of Nairobi and a serene atmosphere for camping.

campgrounds.name: Oloiden Campsite
campgrounds.description: Nestled on the shores of Lake Oloiden, Oloiden Campsite offers stunning views of the lake and surrounding landscapes. The campsite features camping sites, cottages, and bandas, and activities like fishing, birdwatching, and boat rides are available.

campgrounds.name: Campi ya Kanzi
campgrounds.description: A luxury tented campsite located on the slopes of Mount Kilimanjaro, offering guided nature walks, game drives, and cultural visits to the local Maasai community.
